titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to establish a connection between certain computerized indexes containing information on deportable aliens.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.
Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for computer linkage between the Immigration and Naturalization Service and the National Crime Information Center and other computerized criminal indexes with respect to information on aliens convicted of crimes and deportable aliens.
